description:
Kogoro, Conan, and Toto TV`s Kokuri visit hotel room 402 where spirit detective Hotta Gaito is staying where they witness the fleeing suspect and discover Hotta`s murdered body. Conan examines the room while recalling the events leading up to and immediately after they opened the door. Conan and Sera have already identified the killer. Later, Conan realizes the trick the killer used based on Kogoro`s actions. Conan puts Kogoro to sleep using a tranquilizer and is about to solve the case when he realizes his bow tie-shaped voice changer is missing...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’affaire du médium détective assassiné (2e partie)
霊魂探偵殺害事件 (後編)
